alternativeNames: Weerasooriya, Weerasooriya Arachchi Appuhamilage Aruna Dharmapriya
comments: Has published as W.A.A.A.D. Weerasooriya but later published as A. Weerasooriya.
examples: Gordonia dassanayakei B.M. Wadhwa & A. Weerasooriya in M.D. Dassanayake & W.D.  Clayton, eds., Revised Handb. Fl. Ceylon, 10: 392 (1996).
source: IK db. Full name and year of birth from S. Dressler
